MAKING MATH FUN
Board Game

We developed a board game that teaches math in a fun and engaging way. The game is designed for the people at Centro de Inclus√£o and is based on the national curriculum. The game is designed to be played in groups of 2-4 players and is suitable for use in the classroom or at home.
Our board game incorporates a variety of mathematical concepts tailored to different learning levels, ensuring that players can build their skills progressively. Each round presents unique challenges that encourage critical thinking, problem-solving, and collaboration among players.

Learn More
A FUN INTERACTIVE TOOL
Digital Game

Discover Give n' Take Digital Game, our innovative digital game designed to provide an accessible and interactive platform for developing crucial money management skills. This game is also designed for adults with disabilities, leveraging realistic currency simulation to create a dynamic and educational experience.
The digital representations of money help players practice counting and financial literacy in an engaging format. Interactive tasks guide players through counting different denominations, building accuracy and confidence. Real-world scenarios where players must give the correct change enhance their readiness for cashier duties.

Learn More
Learn More

Moo-D is a game development company dedicated to crafting engaging and educational experiences for adults with cognitive disabilities. Our team of passionate designers, developers, and educators collaborates to produce high-quality games that seamlessly blend entertainment with learning.
